I am so FREAK’N glad I got into Son House, Robert Johnson, Blind Willie Jefferson and the rest of these ‘ole delta blues greats. They add so much understanding on where rock/metal came from and how one can really access the roots to help pick the fruit from the vine. It’s so damn necessary; fundamental.
